long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily perform vehicle checks.

✅ Transforms vehicle registrations on any webpage into clickable links which will automatically perform a vehicle check via the MotorCheck website

✅ Alternatively right-click a vehicle registration and perform a check via the context menu

✅ All without leaving the page

✅ Easily login to the MotorCheck website via the side panel
